p: Non-polluted soil samples were obtained from the experimental field area of PMAS-Agriculture University, Rawalpindi, which had no prior exposure to hydrocarbons. The soil was sieved and was divided into three parts, 1/3 of soil was kept clean and was taken as control, the second was Low Crude oil Contamination contaminated with 10% (w/w) and the third part was High Crude oil Contamination contaminated with 20% crude oil (w/w), respectively.
